title: Web-Based Distance Education Design and Operational Practices

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and elementary understanding of online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A course on effectively designing and operating web-based remote education in university settings, combining theoretical learning with practical exercises to enhance competencies in actual courseware development and management.

learning_goals: Learners can design and develop educational content utilizing web-based courseware (e.g., WebCT)
Learners can explain principles for developing educational materials considering digital copyright issues
Learners can develop web-based educational modules integrating audiovisual materials with interactive elements
Learners can design web-based assessment strategies to promote learner engagement

resources: Access rights to web-based courseware platforms (e.g., WebCT)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
